channel.title: PORTFOLIO on Thong Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in PORTFOLIO on Thong Nguyen

item.title: Carreer goals
item.description: My short-term goals. Gain a new skill every month that related to my current industry I work for. Boost my connection to improve my abilities by widening social and professional contacts Gain experience is my first step. As a freshly graduated student as well as the one who is looking to change fields, an internship may be the best way to get a close look inside my want. But I will try my best to show my bright to get a probation job.

item.title: Cerifications & degrees
item.description: C Certification Java Certification Degree of Engineer HACKATHON ITSTU Social work 2017-2018 Good student scholarship of learning and forming School-level Students of 5 merits Award School-level Students of 5 merits Award 合格証３Q 合格証３Q score report

item.title: Resume
item.description: Nguyễn Quốc Nguyên Thông Email: quocnguyenthongnguyen@gmail.com Birthday: 2 Jan Place: District 8, Ho Chi Minh city Objectives: I want to gain technical experience from actual operations, improve my current programming and teamwork skills. I will do my best to get promoted as fast as possible for next 3-4 years. I am now open to learn new technology. EDUCATION: SAIGON TECHNOLOGY UNIVERSITY (2015-2019) Major: Computer Science GPA: 7.25/10

item.title: Sample project
item.description: In university I made 3 important project. The fist is using C/C++ built a family free application. This is my first computer project. link to my Family free structures by C programing language The second one is using PHP to built a e-commerce site. This is my major Web project. Link to my PHP e-commerce site! And the last one is my graduation project using Spring MVC framework built a e-commerce site.

item.title: Skills
item.description: My hard skills that I am confident with: Typing. I found that a lot of Vietnamese type only with few fingers. It so terrible! Typing with full fingers is the first basic, the first prerequisite. You can not fully concentrate with your task while you look into the screen and look down to see the keyboards Foreign languages. Nowadays English is a popular language, without English, I think I so hard to survive in competitive environment

item.title: Social works
item.description: I often spend my weekend to enjoy social, voluntary activities for community. I also have a lot of achievements like Green Summer Volunteer Campaign, Spring Volunteer Campaign, etc during the last 5 year. Being a dynamic person by connecting people. I think a dynamic person is charismatic and charming. Doing social activities makes my soft skills better, it help me refresh my energy by meeting awesome people and grow me up faster.

item.title: Work philosophy
item.description: My philosophy towards work is taking on new challenges, and activities that make you improve and learn on a regular basis, treating others with respect and start with a smile. I’am enjoy speaking with others and I’m very dedicated to helping everyone. And one more thing, I believe in science, I do not believe in supernatural being. As a true man I think men should be a little feminine, 100% manly is too coldly.
